description:
Aug 29-Sept 1: BLUE LINE - Rundle to Franklin closure

The Blue Line will be closed between Rundle and Franklin stations starting at 8 p.m. on Friday, August 29 until 2 p.m. on Monday, September 1.

Blue Line trains coming from the west and downtown will terminate at Franklin Station, and trains from the northeast will terminate at Rundle Station. Shuttle buses will replace train service between these stations.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service

Aug 29-Sept 1: RED LINE - Heritage to Victoria Park/Stampede closure

The Red Line will be closed between Heritage and Victoria Park/Stampede stations starting at 8 p.m. on Friday, August 29 until 2 p.m. on Monday, September 1.

Red Line trains coming from the north and downtown will terminate at Victoria Park/Stampede Station, and trains from the south will terminate at Heritage Station. Shuttle buses will replace train service between these stations.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
